dlentry.dd: Looks for differences between the two files displayed in the left and right side of the application window.

dd.ph: Formats and indents both files before comparing them. Use this option for comparisons that contain long lines that make it difficult to spot differences.
dd.note: When comparing two JSON files, the Format and Indent Both Files action will automatically sort the keys the same in both files to make it easier to compare the files.

dt.uicontrol: Copy Change from Right to Left

dd.ph: Copies the selected difference from the target file in the right side to the source file in the left side.

dt.uicontrol: Copy All Changes from Right to Left

dd.ph: Copies all changes from the target file in the right side to the source file in the left side.

dlentry.dd: Jumps to the next block of changes. This action is disabled when the cursor is positioned on the last change block or when there are no changes.A change block groups one or more consecutive lines that contain at least one change.
Jumps to the previous block of changes. This action is disabled when the cursor is positioned on the first change block or when there are no changes.

Jumps to the next change from the current block of changes. When the last change from the current block of changes is reached, it highlights the next block of changes. This action is disabled when the cursor is positioned on the last change or when there are no changes.

Jumps to the previous change from the current block of changes. When the first change from the current block of changes is reached, it highlights the previous block of changes. This action is disabled when the cursor is positioned on the first change or when there are no changes.

dt.uicontrol: Copy All Changes from Left to Right

dd.ph: Copies all changes from the source file in the left side to the target file in the right side.

dt.uicontrol: Copy Change from Left to Right

dd.ph: Copies the selected difference from the source file in the left side to the target file in the right side.

dlentry.dd: Looks for differences between the two directories displayed in the left and right side of the application window.
Opens the Compare Files tool that allows you to compare the currently selected files.

dt.uicontrol: Copy Change from Right to Left

dd.ph: Copies the selected change from the right side to the left side (if there is no file/folder in the right side, the left file/folder is deleted).

dt.uicontrol: Copy Change from Left to Right

dd.ph: Copies the selected change from the left side to the right side (if there is no file/folder in the left side, the right file/folder is deleted).
